::DevilDuer/Perndabot::

DevilDuer grunts under the weight of the CR chamber he was carrying. He and 
Perndabot had salvaged Amobeous and Bacterium's ship, and were now carrying 
their spoils back toward base.

"Damn heavy CR chamber," DevilDuer grumbles.

Perndabot looks at him, raising an eyebrow. Perndabot's load was much larger 
than DevilDuer's, but the large bot was carrying it with little difficulty, 
"Stop whining. Zardus will be very pleased."

The two bots walk on, DevilDuer muttering to himself.
